app.name: Openly Customer Policy Info
app.long_description: Openly Customer Policy Info - Displays Policy information from Portal.
app.installation_instructions: Configure the following app settings, then click Install:...
app.title: Openly Customer Policy Info

fields.label: Displayed Fields by Id
fields.helpText: Enter the Field Id's seperated by commas in the order you want them displayed. eg name,email,external_id,tags,time_zone. Default is 'all'.

sections.label: Displayed Section Titles
sections.helpText: Enter the Section titles seperated by commas in the order you want them displayed. eg. Transactional,Billing,Claims. Default is 'all'.
